00051 void display_shutdown_view(void) {
00052         glcd_clear();
00053         display_text_center_adjust(10,"Shutdown",8, FONT_FIFTEEN_DOT);
00054         display_text_center_adjust(30,"in progress",11, FONT_FIFTEEN_DOT);
00055         glcd_update_all();
00056 }

00059 void display_setup_view(void) {
00060         glcd_clear();
00061         display_text_center_adjust(10,"Setup",5, FONT_FIFTEEN_DOT);
00062         display_text_center_adjust(30,"in progress",11, FONT_FIFTEEN_DOT);
00063         glcd_update_all();
00064 }

00069 unsigned char display_screensaver_mode(void) {
00070         return(screensaver_mode);
00071 }
00072 
00074 void display_update_screensaver(void) {
00075         //If the temp_ptr hasn't been initialized then we need to allocate the memory for it
00076         if (temp_ptr == NULL)
00077                 temp_ptr = (char *)malloc(8);
00078 
00079         if (screensaver_mode == 0)
00080                 screensaver_mode = 1;
00081 
00082         ds1307_read();
00083 
00084         sprintf((char *)temp_ptr,"%02i:%02i:%02i",ds1307_get_hours(),ds1307_get_minutes(),ds1307_get_seconds());
00085 
00086         glcd_clear();
00087         glcd_text(8, 23, FONT_EIGHTEEN_DOT,temp_ptr,strlen(temp_ptr));
00088         glcd_update_all();
00089 
00090         if (screensaver_mode == 1)
00091                 event_add_message((void*)display_update_screensaver, 250, 0);
00092 }
00093 
00097 void display_set_backlight(unsigned char value) {
00098         //Set the pulse width
00099         OCR1CH = 0x00;
00100         OCR1CL = (2.55f * value);
00101 }
00102 
00111 unsigned char display_calculate_width(char *str, unsigned char font, unsigned char length) {
00112         unsigned char width = 0;
00113         
00114         for (unsigned char pos=0;pos<length;pos++)
00115         {
00116                 if (fonts[font].fixed_width != 0)
00117                         width += fonts[font].fixed_width;
00118                 else
00119                         width += fonts[font].width_table[(char)*(str+pos)-fonts[font].glyph_beg];
00120         }
00121         
00122         return (width);
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00132 void display_text_center_adjust(unsigned char y,char *str, unsigned char length, unsigned char font) {
00133         glcd_text(64-display_calculate_width(str, font, length)/2, y, font,str,length);
00134 }
00135 
00142 void display_text_right_adjust(unsigned char x, unsigned char y,char *str, unsigned char length, unsigned char font) {
00143         glcd_text(x-display_calculate_width(str, font, length), y, font,str,length);
00144 }

00149 void display_antennas(unsigned char band) {
00150         CLEAR_ANT_AREA(); //Clears the antenna field of the display
00151         
00152         //Check if the antenna is in use by another device, in that case
00153         //we indicate that on the display. Otherwise we just print as usual
00154         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(0) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG)) {
00155                 char temp[strlen(antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(0))+2];
00156                 sprintf(temp,"(%s)",antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(0));
00157                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT1_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT1_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,temp,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(0));
00158         }
00159         else    
00160                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT1_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT1_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(0),antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(0));
00161 
00162         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(1) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG)) {
00163                 char temp[strlen(antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(1))+2];
00164                 sprintf(temp,"(%s)",antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(1));
00165                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT2_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT2_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,temp,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(1));
00166         }
00167         else    
00168                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT2_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT2_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(1),antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(1));
00169 
00170         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(2) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG)) {
00171                 char temp[strlen(antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(2))+2];
00172                 sprintf(temp,"(%s)",antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(2));
00173                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT3_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT3_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,temp,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(2));
00174         }
00175         else    
00176                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT3_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT3_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(2),antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(2));
00177 
00178         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(3) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG)) {
00179                 char temp[strlen(antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(3))+2];
00180                 sprintf(temp,"(%s)",antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(3));
00181                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT4_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT4_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,temp,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(3));
00182         }
00183         else    
00184                 glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT4_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT4_Y_POS, FONT_NINE_DOT,antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(3),antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(3));
00185 }

00192 void display_rotator_directions(unsigned char band) {
00193         CLEAR_ROTATOR_AREA();
00194         char temp_dir[7];
00195         
00196         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(0) & (1<<ANTENNA_ROTATOR_FLAG)) {
00197                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"%3i deg",antenna_ctrl_get_direction(0));
00198                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT1_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT1_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00199         }
00200         
00201         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(1) & (1<<ANTENNA_ROTATOR_FLAG)) {
00202                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"%3i deg",antenna_ctrl_get_direction(1));
00203                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT2_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT2_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00204         }
00205 
00206         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(2) & (1<<ANTENNA_ROTATOR_FLAG)) {
00207                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"%3i deg",antenna_ctrl_get_direction(2));
00208                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT3_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT3_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00209         }
00210 
00211         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(3) & (1<<ANTENNA_ROTATOR_FLAG)) {
00212                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"%3i deg",antenna_ctrl_get_direction(3));
00213                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT4_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT4_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00214         }
00215         
00216         if (antenna_ctrl_get_sub_menu_type(0) == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00217                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"Dir %s",sub_menu_get_text(0, sub_menu_get_current_pos(0)));
00218                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT1_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT1_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00219         }
00220         
00221         if (antenna_ctrl_get_sub_menu_type(1) == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00222                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"Dir %s",sub_menu_get_text(1, sub_menu_get_current_pos(1)));
00223                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT2_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT2_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00224         }
00225         
00226         if (antenna_ctrl_get_sub_menu_type(2) == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00227                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"Dir %s",sub_menu_get_text(2, sub_menu_get_current_pos(2)));
00228                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT3_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT3_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00229         }
00230         
00231         if (antenna_ctrl_get_sub_menu_type(3) == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00232                 sprintf((char *)temp_dir,"Dir %s",sub_menu_get_text(3, sub_menu_get_current_pos(3)));
00233                 display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT4_X_POS,DISPLAY_TEXT_ROTATOR_ANT4_Y_POS,temp_dir,strlen(temp_dir),FONT_SEVEN_DOT);
00234         }       
00235 }

00241 void display_invert_antenna(unsigned char ant_index) {
00242         unsigned char x2=0,y1=0,y2=0;
00243         
00244         //This function works only with characters with width = 8
00245         if (ant_index == ANTENNA_1) {
00246                 y1 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT1_Y_POS;
00247                 y2 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT1_Y_POS+DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT_HEIGHT;
00248                 x2 = antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(0)*DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_WIDTH-1;
00249                 
00250                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(0) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG))
00251                         x2 += DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_IN_USE_ADDITION_WIDTH;
00252         } 
00253         else if (ant_index == ANTENNA_2) {
00254                 y1 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT2_Y_POS;
00255                 y2 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT2_Y_POS+DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT_HEIGHT;
00256                 x2 = antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(1)*DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_WIDTH-1;
00257                 
00258                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(1) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG))
00259                         x2 += DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_IN_USE_ADDITION_WIDTH;
00260         }
00261         else if (ant_index == ANTENNA_3) {
00262                 y1 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT3_Y_POS;
00263                 y2 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT3_Y_POS+DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT_HEIGHT;
00264                 x2 = antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(2)*DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_WIDTH-1;
00265                 
00266                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(2) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG))
00267                         x2 += DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_IN_USE_ADDITION_WIDTH;
00268         }
00269         else if (ant_index == ANTENNA_4) {
00270                 y1 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT4_Y_POS;
00271                 y2 = DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT4_Y_POS+DISPLAY_TEXT_ANT_HEIGHT;
00272                 x2 = antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text_length(3)*DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_WIDTH-1;
00273                 
00274                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(3) & (1<<ANTENNA_IN_USE_FLAG))
00275                         x2 += DISPLAY_TEXT_ANTENNA_IN_USE_ADDITION_WIDTH;
00276         }
00277         else return;
00278 
00279         glcd_invert_area(0,x2,y1,y2);
00280 }

00287         CLEAR_RADIO_FREQ_AREA();
00288         display_text_right_adjust(DISPLAY_RADIO_FREQ_X_POS,DISPLAY_RADIO_FREQ_Y_POS,freq,length,FONT_FIVE_DOT);

00296 void display_view(unsigned char mode) {
00297         if (mode == VIEW_ANTENNAS) {
00298                 glcd_line(0,128,55);
00299         }
00300 }

00304 void display_show_rx_ant(unsigned char ant_index) {
00305         if (status.current_display_level == DISPLAY_LEVEL_BAND) {       
00306                 CLEAR_RX_ANTENNA_AREA();
00307 
00308                 if ((antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_count() >= ant_index) && (ant_index != 0)) {
00309                         char temp[strlen(antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_name(ant_index-1))+4];
00310                         
00311                         sprintf((char *)temp, "RX: %s",antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_name(ant_index-1));
00312                         
00313                         glcd_text(DISPLAY_TEXT_RX_ANT_X_POS, DISPLAY_TEXT_RX_ANT_Y_POS, FONT_SIX_DOT, temp, strlen(temp));
00314                 }
00315                 else {
00316                         display_view(VIEW_ANTENNAS);
00317                 }
00318                 
00319                 glcd_update_all();
00320         }
00321 }

00326 void display_show_set_heading(unsigned int rotator_heading, unsigned char view_360_deg) {
00327         if (status.current_display_level == DISPLAY_LEVEL_BAND) {       
00328                 glcd_clear();
00329                 char temp[7];
00330                 char size = 0;
00331                 
00332                 if (view_360_deg == 1) {
00333                         if (rotator_heading >= 360)
00334                                 rotator_heading -= 360;
00335                 }
00336                 
00337                 if (rotator_heading < 10)
00338                         size = 1;
00339                 else if (rotator_heading < 100)
00340                         size = 2;
00341                 else
00342                         size = 3;
00343                                 
00344                 sprintf((char *)temp, "Heading");
00345                 display_text_center_adjust(0, temp, strlen(temp), FONT_FIFTEEN_DOT);
00346                 
00347                 sprintf((char *)temp, "%i",rotator_heading);
00348                 display_text_center_adjust(20, temp, size, FONT_MT1);
00349                 
00350                 glcd_update_all();
00351         }
00352 }
00353 
00358 void display_update(unsigned char band, unsigned char antenna) {
00359         if (status.current_display_level == DISPLAY_LEVEL_BAND) {
00360                 display_antennas(band);
00361                 display_rotator_directions(band);
00362                 
00363                 display_update_radio_freq();
00364                 
00365                 display_view(VIEW_ANTENNAS);
00366                 
00367                 if (antenna & (1<<0))
00368                         display_invert_antenna(ANTENNA_1);
00369 
00370                 if (antenna & (1<<1))
00371                         display_invert_antenna(ANTENNA_2);
00372 
00373                 if (antenna & (1<<2))
00374                         display_invert_antenna(ANTENNA_3);
00375 
00376                 if (antenna & (1<<3))
00377                         display_invert_antenna(ANTENNA_4);
00378                 
00379                 glcd_update_all();
00380         }
00381 }
00382 
00384 void display_update_radio_freq(void) {
00385         if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_ANTENNA_INFO) {
00386                 if ((runtime_settings.band_change_mode == BAND_CHANGE_MODE_AUTO) && (radio_interface_get_interface() != RADIO_INTERFACE_BCD)) {
00387                         if ((radio_interface_get_interface() == RADIO_INTERFACE_CAT_POLL) | (radio_interface_get_interface() == RADIO_INTERFACE_CAT_MON)) {
00388                                 char temp_str[14];
00389                                 char temp_bandport = '?';
00390                                 
00391                                 unsigned char temp_port = radio_get_band_portion();
00392                                 
00393                                 if (temp_port == BAND_HIGH)
00394                                         temp_bandport = 'H';
00395                                 else if (temp_port == BAND_LOW)
00396                                         temp_bandport = 'L';
00397                                         
00398                                 sprintf((char *)temp_str, "%0i kHz (%c)",radio_get_current_freq(), temp_bandport);
00399                                                         
00400                                 display_radio_freq(strlen(temp_str),(char *)temp_str);
00401                                 
00402                                 display_view(VIEW_ANTENNAS);
00403                         }
00404                         else
00405                                 CLEAR_RADIO_FREQ_AREA();
00406                 }
00407                 else if ((runtime_settings.band_change_mode == BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL) || ((runtime_settings.band_change_mode == BAND_CHANGE_MODE_AUTO) && (radio_interface_get_interface() == RADIO_INTERFACE_BCD))) {
00408                         char temp_str[4];
00409                         unsigned char temp_nr_to_view = 0;
00410                         
00411                         if (status.current_band_portion == BAND_HIGH) {
00412                                 temp_str[0] = 'H';
00413                                 temp_str[1] = 'I';
00414                                 temp_str[2] = 'G';
00415                                 temp_str[3] = 'H';
00416                                 
00417                                 temp_nr_to_view = 4;
00418                         }
00419                         else if (status.current_band_portion == BAND_LOW) {
00420                                 temp_str[0] = 'L';
00421                                 temp_str[1] = 'O';
00422                                 temp_str[2] = 'W';
00423                                 
00424                                 temp_nr_to_view = 3;
00425                         }
00426                         
00427                         display_radio_freq(temp_nr_to_view,(char *)temp_str);
00428                         display_view(VIEW_ANTENNAS);
00429                 }
00430                 
00431                 glcd_update_all();
00432         }
00433 }

00438 void display_show_sub_menu(unsigned char ant_index, unsigned char sub_menu_type) {
00439         if (status.current_display_level == DISPLAY_LEVEL_SUBMENU) {
00440                 char temp[10];
00441                 
00442                 if (sub_menu_type == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00443                         CLEAR_SET_SUB_MENU_ARRAY_AREA();
00444                         
00445                         sprintf((char *)temp, "%s",antenna_ctrl_get_antenna_text(ant_index));
00446                         display_text_center_adjust(3, temp, strlen(temp), FONT_NINE_DOT);
00447                         
00448                         sprintf((char *)temp, "Direction");
00449                         display_text_center_adjust(19, temp, strlen(temp), FONT_NINE_DOT);
00450                         
00451                         sprintf((char *)temp, "%s",sub_menu_get_text(ant_index, sub_menu_get_current_pos(ant_index)));
00452                         display_text_center_adjust(38, temp, strlen(temp), FONT_FIFTEEN_DOT);
00453                         
00454                         glcd_update_all();
00455                 }
00456         }
00457 }

00461 void display_show_bargraph_fwd(unsigned char percent) {
00462         unsigned char val = (unsigned char)(((float)percent*122.0f)/100.0);
00463         
00464         if (last_fwd_val > val) {
00465                 for (unsigned char i=val;i<last_fwd_val;i++) {
00466                         glcd_set_byte(3+i,2,0x00);
00467 
00468                         if ((i%5) == 0) {
00469                                 glcd_set_byte(3+i,2,0x00);
00470                         }
00471                 }
00472                 
00473                 glcd_update_area(3+val,last_fwd_val+3,16,24);
00474         }
00475         else {
00476                 for (unsigned char i=last_fwd_val;i<val;i++) {
00477                         glcd_set_byte(3+i,2,0xFF);
00478 
00479                         if ((i%5) == 0) {
00480                                 glcd_set_byte(3+i,2,0x00);
00481                         }
00482                 }
00483         
00484                 glcd_update_area(3+last_fwd_val,3+val,16,24);
00485         }
00486         
00487         last_fwd_val = val;
00488 }
00489 
00492 void display_show_bargraph_ref(unsigned char percent) {
00493         unsigned char val = (unsigned char)(((float)percent*77.0f)/100.0);
00494         
00495         if (last_ref_val > val) {
00496                 for (unsigned char i=val;i<last_ref_val;i++) {
00497                         glcd_set_byte(3+i,6,0x00);
00498 
00499                         if ((i%5) == 0) {
00500                                 glcd_set_byte(3+i,6,0x00);
00501                         }
00502                 }
00503                 
00504                 glcd_update_area(3+val,last_ref_val+3,48,56);
00505         }
00506         else {
00507                 for (unsigned char i=last_ref_val;i<val;i++) {
00508                         glcd_set_byte(3+i,6,0xFF);
00509 
00510                         if ((i%5) == 0) {
00511                                 glcd_set_byte(3+i,6,0x00);
00512                         }
00513                 }
00514         
00515                 glcd_update_area(3+last_ref_val,3+val,48,56);
00516         }
00517         
00518         last_ref_val = val;
00519 }
00520 
00524 void display_show_powermeter_bargraph(unsigned int fwd_power, unsigned int ref_power) {
00525         display_show_bargraph_fwd(fwd_power);
00526         display_show_bargraph_ref(ref_power);
00527 }

00541 void display_show_powermeter(void) {
00542         glcd_rectangle(0,0,28,128);
00543         glcd_rectangle(0,32,28,128);
00544 
00545         glcd_text(3,3,FONT_NINE_DOT,"FWD:",4);
00546         glcd_text(3,34,FONT_NINE_DOT,"REF:",4);
00547         display_text_right_adjust(125,34,"VSWR",4,FONT_NINE_DOT);
